dr.evomodel.tree.randomlocalmodel
Interface RandomLocalTreeVariable

All Known Implementing Classes:
RandomLocalClockModel, RandomLocalYuleModel, TaxonRichnessBirthDeathModel
public interface RandomLocalTreeVariable

This interface provides for a stochastic variable selection model on a tree. The model has two values at each node in the tree: an indicator and a real-valued parameter. The real-valued parameter is only used if the indicator is true.

Author:
Alexei Drummond

isVariableSelected

boolean isVariableSelected(Tree tree,
                           NodeRef node)
Parameters:
tree - the tree
node - the node
Returns:
true of the variable at this node is included in function, thus representing a change in the function looking down the tree.
